Trade/Device Name(s): Uritek TC-201 Urine Chemistry Test System
Regulation Name(s): Urinary protein or albumin (nonquantitative) test system
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Indicator method based on dye binding
Indicator method based on peroxidase-like activity
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Uritek TC-201 Urine Chemistry Test System, an automated urinalysis system for semiquantitative detection of microalbumin and creatinine in urine.
Indications for Use Summary: For prescription, in vitro diagnostic use by professionals at point-of-care sites; used with UAC Strips for semiquantitative detection of microalbumin and creatinine and determination of albumin to creatinine ratio in urine as an aid in detecting patients at risk for kidney damage.
